coreAttributes.name: cowbell collar
coreAttributes.description: A leather collar, with a cowbell attached to the front which rings with the movement of the wearer.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(put)] on the cowbell collar, before fastening the clasp at the back of [npc.her] neck in order to hold it in place.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(wrap)] the cowbell collar around [npc2.namePos] neck, before fastening the clasp at the back to make sure that it stays in place.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] firmly [npc.verb(grab)] [npc2.name], before roughly fastening the cowbell collar around [npc2.her] neck.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unfasten)] [npc.her] cowbell collar, before taking it off from around [npc.her] neck.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unfasten)] [npc2.namePos] cowbell collar, before taking it off from around [npc2.her] neck.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(unfasten)] [npc2.namePos] cowbell collar, before yanking it off from around [npc2.her] neck.
